price.title: Cheap, transparent prices!
price.contact: for to contact our support team.
price.contact_2: You can test the subscriptions and won't be charged.
price.faq_detail: Explore our comprehensive FAQ to find quick answers to common inquiries. If you need further assistance, don't hesitate to contact us for personalized help.

hero.tagline_sub: AI built to think and evolve with you
hero.title: Delegating decisions to AI is risky
hero.description: MindLoop creates intelligent systems that reason, learn and evolve with you. Not instead of you.

manifesto.title: The intelligence of the future is not artificial — it's shared.
manifesto.description: MindLoop believes that AI should be a tool — not a worker...

cta_final.title: Let's build the future of intelligence.
cta_final.description: If you believe AI should amplify — not replace — human potential...

trusted_by.tagline: Trusted by EHS, Compliance and Operations professionals

iaa_concept.title: Intelligence is not artificial. It's collaborative.
iaa_concept.description: MindLoop is designed around learning loops: humans interpret, adjust and guide — and AI records, learns and evolves. Every decision is the result of structured dialogue between experts and systems.
iaa_concept.human_desc: Context, responsibility, judgment and practical experience.
iaa_concept.ai_desc: Multi-step reasoning, memory, normative search and explanations.
iaa_concept.loop_desc: Each interaction adjusts the model, refines criteria and strengthens trust between people and machine.

superpowers.title: Why
superpowers.description: We are not just "another AI chat". MindLoop was created to handle serious decisions, in regulated environments, with real impact on people, assets and the environment.
superpowers.item_1_desc: Goes beyond chat answers. Handles incidents, standards and context in structured decision chains.
superpowers.item_2_desc: Each classification comes with criteria, decision trail and normative reference.
superpowers.item_3_desc: Human interventions (HITL) feed the system, improving future decisions without losing control.
superpowers.item_4_desc: Architecture designed for regulated operations, audits, process safety and EHS.

about.title: About
about.description_1: We created MindLoop with the conviction that the artificial intelligence of the future will not replace humans — it will work alongside them.
about.description_2: Our name represents this cycle: a learning loop between human and machine.

story.title: Why does MindLoop exist?
story.description_1: MindLoop was born from practice in high-risk environments, where decisions cannot be blindly delegated to AI models. We saw firsthand the risk of treating incidents, standards and people as simple tokens in a prompt.
story.description_2: Our response was to create a different paradigm: Assisted Artificial Intelligence. We don't want to replace the expert — we want to give them a more robust, fast and explainable reasoning structure.

culture.title: Our
culture.description: MindLoop was born to unite technology, science and humanity.
culture.item_1_desc: We are always asking 'why?' and 'what if?'.
culture.item_2_desc: AI requires care, transparency and respect for humans.
culture.item_3_desc: Nothing is static. Learning is part of our DNA.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.text_2024: The idea is born: AI must amplify humans, not replace them.
timeline.text_2025: Creation of IAA™ philosophy – Assisted Artificial Intelligence.
timeline.text_2026: MindLoop establishes its first cognitive agents framework.

product_flow.title: How MindLoop thinks with you.
product_flow.description: Behind the simple interface, MindLoop coordinates multiple agents, standards and memories to deliver a solid and explainable decision.
product_flow.step_1_text: Free description, attachments and operational context sent by field or control team.
product_flow.step_2_text: LATS-P, normative RAG, memory and incident history work together to understand the case.
product_flow.step_3_text: ANP typology, EHS classification and criteria are returned with decision trail.
product_flow.step_4_text: Everything is recorded in structured form, for internal audits, regulators and continuous improvement.

testimonials.title: What experts say about MindLoop
testimonials.quote_1: MindLoop finally brought structure and explainability to decisions that previously depended on long debates between areas.
testimonials.quote_2: Seeing the ANP classification, EHS and the reasoning trail side by side changed the quality of our investigations.

marketing.sub_features: Cloud-native: Simplifying technology and reducing costs for startups.

right_side.ship_on_cloudflare_desc: Grow your business with our Cloudflare-powered platform.
right_side.showcase_desc: See what people are building and chat with them. And show off your apps to the world.

features_grid.monorepo_desc: Manage multiple projects in a unified way to make code sharing easier and collaboration more efficient.
features_grid.i18n_desc: Multilingual support made easy. Give your users a better experience and expand your business globally.
features_grid.payments_desc: Expand your business globally with our secure, convenient, and efficient payment platform.
features_grid.nextauth_desc: Empower your app with secure and seamless authentication, creating a frictionless login experience.
